title: Levkovich offers broad market outlook.
summary: In an appearance on Bloomberg TV, Citi's Chief US Equity Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses the potential impact on markets from a range of issues including geopolitical risk, gas prices, government deficits and the pullback on quantitative easing.
tag-2: In an appearance on Bloomberg TV, Citi's Chief US Equity Strategist Tobias Levkovich discusses the potential impact on markets from a range of issues including geopolitical risk, gas prices, government deficits and the pullback on quantitative easing.
